Just like the Super 8 leak with H Stearn, I'm very disappointed in the ripper of this torrent and the uploaded for not protecting the identity of the person whom made this available. Every time you openly share the Identity of the source you burn bridges, now B Walters will never loan a screener out again if she ever receives one again, but when this hits the news like Super 8 did, it will only make everybody else think twice before sharing a screener. So by being too lazy to crop a bit or taking a short amount of time to blur the watermark, you've fucked another great source, and by doing so you've fucked the whole community.  But yeah, give the guy his props and making jokes about the source of which the movie came and no future films will ever come from again.

The source could be anyone in one of the guilds or film unions and they know the risk when loaning these out. There are warnings plastered all over the screeners to not copy and to destroy after viewing. They know the risk they are taking. Alot more than just some burnt bridges is going to happen to them.
